attributes.action: Call a national referendum on introducing Proportional Representation as the UK's electoral system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time for the people of Britain to be given the opportunity to state whether they would choose to adopt a new electoral system, Proportional Representation (PR), to elect our future governments. We call on the government to announce a national referendum on PR before the next general election. PR is likely to lead to greatly increased voter turn-outs and will encourage much greater individual political participation.
